name: Orange, Rosewater, and Mint Sparkler
description: Bright and floral, the orange rosewater sparkler is made with fresh-squeezed orange, muddled mint, and rosewater.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup mint leaves (about 25 leaves), loosely packed and removed from their stems
6 ounces (3/4 cup) fresh orange juice (from 2 medium oranges)

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle the mint leaves gently in a mixing glass. Add orange juice, rosewater, and seltzer, stir gently to combine.
Pour the sparkling orange juice mixture into two ice-filled Old Fashioned glasses and serve immediately.
